chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Geeqie is an image viewer that makes navigation of images easy. Images can be viewed full screen, and a slide show function allows automatic changing of the displayed image.

Geeqie is an image manager, with complete copy, move, rename, and delete functions available at the press of a button. Find the right image with the search feature. Image collectors can free up space with a function that finds duplicate images.
The one thing Geeqie is not, and never will be, is an image editor. However, Geeqie paired with an image editor, such as the Gimp, can be a very powerful combination.

section.title: Advanced Features

listitem.para: Find image duplicates based on image content
View and edit EXIF, IPTC and XMP data stored in images
Simple Sort Manager to quickly sort a folder of images into other folders
Add XMP keywords to images, and recall those images with the search function

section.para: “An application that displays images.” - This was, and still is, the primary goal of Geeqie. Over time image management features have been added, but the core purpose of Geeqie remains the same.
